Tools: None

attribs.name: repeating_classfeature_-Kn7NmozP9NuUTlcPvAk_content
attribs.current: You can use your sorcery points to gain additional spell slots, or sacrifice spell slots to gain additional sorcery points.

attribs.name: repeating_classfeature_-Kn7Nmp-ZhKaqcBqrOpB_content
attribs.current:
Creating Spell Slots. You can transform unexpended sorcery points into one spell slot as a bonus action on your turn. You can create spell slots no higher in level than 5th.Any spell slot you create with this feature vanishes when you finish a long rest.
Spell Slot  Sorcery Point Cost
   1st     2
   2nd     3
   3rd     5
   4th     6
   5th     7
Converting a Spell Slot to Sorcery Points. As a bonus action on your turn, you can expend one spell slot and gain a number of sorcery points equal to the slot's level.

attribs.name: repeating_classfeature_-Kn7Nmp0TCmrRUbOYMeI_content
attribs.current:
You gain the ability to twist your spells to suit your needs. You gain two of the following Metamagic options of your choice. You gain another one at 10th and 17th level.
You can use only one Metamagic option on a spell when you cast it, unless otherwise noted.
Careful Spell, Distant Spell, Empowered Spell, Extended Spell, Heightened Spell, Quickened Spell, Subtle Spell, Twinned Spell.
